overview: The trajectory of the simple boy who came from Sergipe to Santos and found his vocation in football. Friends recount their trajectory from lowland football to Vila Belmiro. Rei Pelé remembers how the boy Clodoaldo trained hard and even asked him to come in more calmly. The partners of the third world championship in Mexico recall the performance and determination of the youngest Brazilian player in the 1970 World Cup.
title: Clodoaldo, Um Coração Santista
